display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]

# Weekly Beta Playtests Every Saturday!

Experience crazy obstacle courses and wield outrageous throwables while helping us shape the future of Clonk!

[media]

# How to Join:
- Join the Clonk Discord to apply each week (https://discord.gg/7PWqcxdZ9Q).
- On Saturdays, open Clonk on your headset to see if you made it in.
- If you’re in, you’ll be able play for the entire playtest session that day.
- If you don’t get in, no worries! You can try again next week.

Any players who make it into a playtest session will receive the exclusive Clonk OG Hoodie. You can also try out outfits and throwable cosmetics using the in-game shops!

[media]

**Join now and get Clonk'd!**

# Weekly Beta Playtests Every Saturday!

Experience crazy obstacle courses and wield outrageous throwables while helping us shape the future of Clonk!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-det1-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491831060_1369057814601882_3768148133925983022_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=3pYyDlsCZq8Q7kNvwFfcY8s&_nc_oc=AdlCaaD0aBp1wdbE0aHADJm5mOdbdROuhx5m97t0p00Dcqq9zUFy3TBmqJM5dl0Mn-vT8zSkztux-cgPbbL7xZHx&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-det1-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=vYMqqJpbc5NtughvbM0J-Q&oh=00_AfgN5qIYFVP9uW5FHE0l1DkIvBPh2zfSZojRgY25jItztw&oe=6932FE5C)

# How to Join:
- Join the Clonk Discord to apply each week (https://discord.gg/7PWqcxdZ9Q).
- On Saturdays, open Clonk on your headset to see if you made it in.
- If you’re in, you’ll be able play for the entire playtest session that day.
- If you don’t get in, no worries! You can try again next week.

Any players who make it into a playtest session will receive the exclusive Clonk OG Hoodie. You can also try out outfits and throwable cosmetics using the in-game shops!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-det1-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499303471_866891165874738_7256987624134358032_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ysyh9nXW9nsQ7kNvwF8Ar2k&_nc_oc=AdnPOu4gfIJq3SGsX3GbmmI1Ytz7bEJV4nBSdm4YZ3URtQggppc-gEUNUFJB9OOELuoPljvatJ-KoeK4Ipxcqnr-&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-det1-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfjpMMn5uVBpNiJBNcGmKsuix04o0wy7po-pDT0algQ8xw&oe=6932D7E4)
